mapper.insert: insert into item( num, name, price, disc_price, main_img, review_cnt, like_cnt, review_rate, col, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id, item_type, cust_type) values( #{num}, #{name}, #{price}, #{disc_price}, #{main_img}, #{review_cnt}, #{like_cnt}, #{review_rate}, #{col}, now(), 'manager', now(), 'manager', #{item_type}, #{cust_type})
mapper.select: select * from item i inner join item_state s on i.num = s.num where i.item_type like #{item_type_format} order by s.sales_qty desc, i.review_cnt desc, i.like_cnt desc
